html:
Jan 5 (Reuters) - Securities analysts revised their ratings and price targets on several European companies, including Aib Group Plc, BMW and Continental AG, on Tuesday.


HIGHLIGHTS

* Aib Group Plc AIBG.I: KBW cuts to market perform from outperform

* BMW BMWG.DE: JP Morgan cuts to neutral from overweight

* Continental AG CONG.DE: JP Morgan raises to overweight from neutral

* ElringKlinger AG ZILGn.DE: JP Morgan raises to neutral from underweight

* Spire Healthcare Group Plc SPI.L: Jefferies raises to hold from underperform

Following is a summary of research actions on European companies reported by Reuters on Tuesday. Stock entries are in alphabetical order.


* Aib Group Plc AIBG.I: KBW cuts to market perform from outperform

* Aixtron SE AIXGn.DE: Liberum raises price target to EUR 16.5 from EUR 14

* Alstria Office REIT AG AOXG.DE: Morgan Stanley raises target to EUR 15.5 from EUR 14.50

* Aroundtown SA AT1.DE: Morgan Stanley raises target price to EUR 5.5 from EUR 5

* ASML Holding NV ASML.AS: Liberum raises target price to EUR 450 from EUR 390

* Aveva AVV.L: UBS raises price target to 4100p from 3500p

* Aveva AVV.L: UBS raises to buy from neutral

* BAE Systems BAES.L: Barclays raises target price to 644p from 635p

* Bank of Ireland Group Plc BIRG.I: KBW raises to outperform from market perform

* Bank of Ireland Group Plc BIRG.I: KBW sets price target of EUR 4.7

* Belimo Holding AG BEAN.S: UBS raises price target to CHF 5970 from CHF 5530

* BMW BMWG.DE: JP Morgan cuts to neutral from overweight

* British Land BLND.L: Morgan Stanley cuts to underweight from equal-weight

* British Land BLND.L: Morgan Stanley raises target price to 410p from 380p

* Burberry BRBY.L: JP Morgan Rolls Forward mar-22 PT of 1,750p vs mar-21 PT of 1,550p

* Burberry BRBY.L: JP Morgan sets March 2022 PT of 1750p vs march 2021 PT of 1550p

* Cairn Energy Plc CNE.L: BofA Global Research cuts to neutral from buy

* Cairn Energy Plc CNE.L: BofA Global Research raises price objective to 225p

* Castellum AB CAST.ST: Morgan Stanley raises target price to SEK 170 from SEK 140

* Colonial COL.MC: Morgan Stanley raises target price to EUR 8.30 from EUR 8

* Compagnie Financiere Richemont SA CFR.S: JP Morgan rolls forward march-22 PT of CHF 77 vs march-21 PT of CHF 65

* Continental AG CONG.DE: JP Morgan raises to overweight from neutral

* Daimler AG DAIGn.DE: JP Morgan raises target price to EUR 69 from EUR 63

* Delivery Hero SE DHER.DE: Citigroup raises price target to EUR 158 from EUR 140

* Diageo DGE.L: Credit Suisse cuts target price to 3400p from 3450p

* Dialog Semiconductor Plc DLGS.DE: Credit Suisse raises target to EUR 58 from EUR 56

* E.ON SE EONGn.DE: JP Morgan initiates with neutral rating and EUR 10 target price

* Ebro Foods SA EBRO.MC: UBS cuts price target to EUR 20 from EUR 22

* Ebro Foods SA EBRO.MC: UBS cuts to neutral from buy

* ElringKlinger AG ZILGn.DE: JP Morgan raises to neutral from underweight

* Endomines AB (PUBL) ENDO.ST: Inderes raises to reduce from sell

* Gestamp Automocion SA GEST.MC: JP Morgan raises price target to EUR 4 from EUR 3

* Great Portland Estates GPOR.L: Morgan Stanley cuts to equalweight from overweight

* Hexaom SA HEXAO.PA: Midcap Partners raises target to EUR 45 from EUR 39; rating buy
